snippet: School districts in Indiana, Oklahoma and Minnesota are rescheduling high-stakes proficiency tests because of technical problems involving the test administrators’ computer systems.
abstract: School districts in Indiana, Oklahoma and Minnesota are rescheduling high-stakes proficiency tests because of technical problems involving test administrators’ computer systems.
lead_paragraph: School districts in Indiana, Oklahoma and Minnesota are rescheduling high-stakes proficiency tests because of technical problems involving the test administrators’ computer systems.

headline.main: Computer Problems in Three States Hamper Student Proficiency Tests
headline.print_headline: Computer Problems In Three States Hamper Student Proficiency Tests
